page.title: 05A new pool and a new job.
page.content: We went to see the baths manager.We asked him some questions.First we asked when the new pool was to open. Mr workman said On the 13th of July. What time will the baths be opening on a morning? It will be opening at 8.00a.m. How much water do you use a day? We use 10_12 000 gallons a year and 5_10000 gallons a week. How long did it take to find and train the staff? It took about 6 years to find and train all of them. How many people do you employ at the baths? We employ 6 attendants 3 attendnts busy 2 permenant 2 part time and 1 manager. How deep is it at each end?6 foot 6 at one end and 3 foot at the other.How did you become a baths manager?He went to a sport centure and became a baths manager.
